Notes

USA Release on ATO Records. “Vomit Bomb” Edition, Opaque gold colored vinyl with a heavy black splatter. Comes with an obi strip with gold foil and custom inner-sleeves. Pre-orders received free Chunky Shrapnel movie poster with their LP.
